title: China nuclear reactor shut down for maintenance because of fuel rod damage
description: A reactor at Taishan Nuclear Power Plant in southern China's Guangdong province has been shut down because of fuel rod damages, the company that runs the plant said in a statement on Friday.

title: Some vaccinated in the US are out of patience with those refusing the shot as coronavirus cases surge and mandates return
Patrick Mahomes rookie card sells for record-breaking $4.3 million
description: Patrick Mahomes is not letting this year be all about Tom Brady.

title: CNN analyst's blunt message to GOP lawmakers on vaccines
description: During a panel discussion on Republican lawmakers' split messaging on coronavirus vaccines, CNN senior political analyst Kirsten Powers had blunt words for GOP members saying the guidance is too confusing.

title: TikTok star wounded in movie theater shooting has died from his injuries
description: A well-known TikTok user has died of his injuries after being wounded in a shooting at a California movie theater Monday night that left another woman dead, police said.

title: A slice of Princess Diana's wedding cake is going up for auction
description: This may be the most expensive piece of cake you'll never eat.

title: Tensions in the House boil over after Capitol riot hearing and mask rule
description: Democratic Rep. Jim Himes of Connecticut did not want to lose his cool, but he said this week he couldn't help it.

title: Video shows Texas family pleading with officer on top of teen
description: Video shows a Kaufman County, Texas, sheriff's deputy on top of an 18-year-old woman saying "I can't breathe." The incident is under investigation.

title: Analysis: Trump commands historic attention for an ex-president. That may hurt the GOP.
description: A sitting president of the United States is usually the person who drives political conversation. Former presidents tend to be an afterthought.

title: This woman has the largest mouth in the world, according to Guinness
description: TikTok is full of users with big mouths, but one star on the social media platform just proved hers is quite literally the largest.

title: Carrie and Boris Johnson are expecting a second baby after miscarriage heartbreak
description: Carrie Johnson, the wife of UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson, has announced the couple are expecting their second child in December.

title: Elaine Thompson-Herah defends Olympic 100m title in all-Jamaican podium
description:
• Live updates: Japan makes history with a record 17 gold medals
• 'My heart was totally broken': The agony of the Olympics

title: 'We thought we were safe.' Rural parts of Africa are now being hit by Covid
description: Pauline Chinyandura adjusts her face mask as she rushes to serve lunch to a group of men visiting her makeshift canteen in Domboshava, a rural area around 25 miles northeast of Zimbabwe's capital Harare.

title: Hollywood's shift to streaming is rewriting the script for stars' big paydays
description: Like other changes to entertainment distribution through the years, the studio shift toward streaming — hastened by the unforeseen consequences of the pandemic — has Hollywood talent and their representatives demanding a different way to be paid.

title: Ajax youth player dies in car accident
description: 16-year-old Ajax youth player Noah Gesser died in a car accident on Friday evening, the Dutch football club announced.

title: What this 'canary in the coal mine' Covid-19 outbreak shows us about the virus
description: A Covid-19 outbreak in Provincetown, Massachusetts, is highlighting the importance of being vaccinated as the vacation destination's cluster has seen no deaths and only four hospitalizations. However, the outbreak is driving new guidance from the CDC after demonstrating how transmissible the Delta variant is.

title: This community hospital was a 'lifeline' to many
description: A record number of rural hospitals are closing across the United States during the Covid pandemic. For this community in Georgia, it's no different. Many here will have to cross state lines, even if that means traveling an hour, to get urgent medical care.

title: A two-headed sea turtle hatchling was found on a South Carolina beach
description: Park volunteers patrolling a beach in South Carolina on Wednesday stumbled upon an unexpected surprise: a two-headed baby sea turtle.

title: Welcome to the 'Gay Games,' an alternative to the Olympics, where activism is encouraged and everyone's an athlete
description: Tom Waddell knew what to expect from an Olympics opening ceremony. He'd experienced one before as a decathlete at the 1968 Mexico City Olympics. He remembered the parade of athletes from around the world, proudly marching alongside their flags before an audience of thousands, cheering on their every move.

title: Covid-19 surge in unvaccinated is only beginning, experts warn
UK covid cases are plummeting but no one really knows why
description: There's one menacing global traveler currently racing through countries faster than Phileas Fogg and its name is the Delta variant.

title: 'My heart was totally broken': The agony of the Olympics and how we measure athlete success
description: After years of dominance that equated to a glut of 20 medals across the past three Olympic Games, Great Britain's rowers reached choppy waters in Tokyo.

title: Man convicted of murder freed by evidence on file for more than 30 years
description: A Philadelphia man wrongfully convicted of murder is finally free after spending more than three decades behind bars.

title: Dad rushed into burning home to save his 18-month-old twin daughters
description: When Ray Lucas and his girlfriend Shi'Ann Brown returned after a trip to the corner store to pick up milk, they found their Michigan home engulfed in flames -- and their twin daughters were trapped inside.

title: Man runs from 'explosion of flames' in Turkey wildfire
description: CNN's Arwa Damon reports from Manavgat, Turkey, where wildfires have killed four people.

title: NASA's Insight Lander reveals new data about Mars
description: Three years after NASA's Insight Lander arrived on Mars, its data reveals that Mars is larger, lighter and has a more liquid core than previously thought. CNN's Kristin Fisher reports.
